definition: surname Gui/abbr. for Guangxi Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区[Guang3 xi1 Zhuang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]
branch/classifier for sticks, rods, pencils etc

sentences.english: Conclusion 70% is the best alcohol concentration of Guizhi Gancao Decoction extracted by SBAE.
sentences.chinese: 結論桂枝甘草湯SBAE法的醇沉濃度以70%爲佳。

sentences.english: No significant influence of GZD on PDE activity was shown in both fever or hypothermia models.
sentences.chinese: 在兩種模型中，桂枝湯對PDE活性的影響均不明顯。

sentences.english: No significant influence of GZD on PDE activity was shown in both fever or h…
sentences.chinese: 在兩種模型中，桂枝湯對PDE活性的影響均不明顯。

sentences.english: B are active fractions of Guizhi Tang with dual-directional regulation on rat blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 爲桂枝湯大鼠血壓雙向調節作用的有效部位。

sentences.english: Objective To study the absorption of Guizhi decoction at different intestinal section.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究桂枝湯在腸道不同部位的吸收特徵。

sentences.english: Treatment to harmonize business-oriented, Guizhi Tonga for the Treatment of choice.
sentences.chinese: 治療以調和營衛爲主，選用桂枝湯加味治療。

sentences.english: Dashan Temple is one of the biggest temples in Guizhi, Zhejiang.
sentences.chinese: 大善寺是浙江桂枝最大的地方之一。

sentences.english: Objective It is to discuss the anti-tumor mechanism of Cinnamon Twig and Poria decoction(CTPD).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討桂枝茯苓湯抗腫瘤的作用機制。

definition: root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
